title: F1's 75-year legacy takes centre stage at 2025 Monterey Motorsports Reunion
summary: The Monterey Motorsports Reunion returns to Laguna Seca this August with four days of historic racing, rare machinery, and a special celebration of Formula 1's 75th anniversary

qa_pairs.question: In which year did Formula 1 celebrate its 75th anniversary?
Where is the Monterey Motorsports Reunion held?
What type of event is the Monterey Motorsports Reunion known for?
